name: events-noEventEmitter
description: Can we document events that don't use node.js `EventEmitter`?, in other words, is there something special about the on() method and its first parameter from where the event name seems to be taken magically by typedoc??

scripts.test: echo "No tests here yet, it's fine" && exit 0
scripts.doc: tsc && typedoc --options typedoc.ts; yarn run docco src/index.ts --output docs/docco
scripts.doc-json: tsc && typedoc --options typedoc.ts; yarn run docco src/index.ts --output docs/docco
